snippet: The market regained most of its losses from the previous day, led by technology stocks, as a Commerce Department retail sales report helped lift investor confidence.
abstract: Market regains most of its losses from the previous day, led by technology stocks, as a Commerce Department retail sales report helps lift investor confidence.
lead_paragraph: The market regained most of its losses from the previous day, led by technology stocks, as a Commerce Department retail sales report helped lift investor confidence.

headline.main: Wall Street Answers A Plummet With a Leap
